title: Current awareness newsletters and blogs: Gary Price’s Resourceshelf, InfoMine Alert from University of California Riverside, ResearchBuzz, Liz Donovan’s news research blog, Bill Dedman’s Power Reporting, SLA News Division Internet Sites for Journalists
description: A list of newsletter and blog resources for journalists and researchers, including Resourceshelf, InfoMine Alert, ResearchBuzz, Liz Donovan’s news research blog, and Bill Dedman’s Power Reporting.
